Tomato_Bacterial_spot.symptoms: Small, dark, water-soaked spots on leaves and fruit.
Tomato_Bacterial_spot.remedy: Use copper-based fungicides and avoid overhead watering.

Tomato_Early_blight.symptoms: Brown spots with concentric rings on lower leaves.
Tomato_Early_blight.remedy: Apply fungicides like chlorothalonil and practice crop rotation.

Tomato_Late_blight.symptoms: Large, dark, water-soaked lesions on leaves and fruit.
Tomato_Late_blight.remedy: Destroy infected plants and apply copper fungicide immediately.

Tomato_Leaf_Mold.symptoms: Yellowing leaves with gray mold on undersides.
Tomato_Leaf_Mold.remedy: Ensure good air circulation and use fungicides like mancozeb.

Tomato_Septoria_leaf_spot.symptoms: Small, circular spots with dark edges on lower leaves.
Tomato_Septoria_leaf_spot.remedy: Remove infected leaves and apply neem oil or fungicides.

Tomato_Spider_mites_Two_spotted_spider_m.symptoms: Yellow stippling on leaves and webbing underneath.
Tomato_Spider_mites_Two_spotted_spider_m.remedy: Spray with insecticidal soap or neem oil.

Tomato__Target_Spot.symptoms: Brown spots with yellow halos on leaves and stems.
Tomato__Target_Spot.remedy: Apply copper fungicide and remove affected leaves.

Tomato__Tomato_YellowLeaf__Curl_Virus.symptoms: Leaves curl upwards, turn yellow, and plant growth is stunted.
Tomato__Tomato_YellowLeaf__Curl_Virus.remedy: Use resistant varieties and control whiteflies with neem oil.

Tomato__Tomato_mosaic_virus.symptoms: Mottled yellow-green leaves with distorted growth.
Tomato__Tomato_mosaic_virus.remedy: Remove infected plants and disinfect gardening tools.

Tomato_healthy.symptoms: No disease detected. Your plant is healthy!
